item.description:
Sunday, July 1st, The Leominster Elks

Dance Lesson at 6
DJ starts at 7:30

Join Luan & Alan, Dance2Swing Studios, at The Leominster Elks,
134 N. Main Street, Leominster, MA for Really Swingin' The
Blues ~ DJ Night with DJ Alan Hep2theJive! The Elks is air
conditioned and offers a great floor, great crowd, great
atmosphere and great bar!
6pm Special Group Swing Dance Lesson in Slow Blues Swing, Some
dance experience necessary for Slow Blues Swing. Slow Blues
Swing is a Slow, Close and Slinky Dance Style that works great
to Slow Blues. Get Slinky, Get Close, Get Wicked Slow.
6:45pm Beginner Friendly Group Swing Dance Lesson
No experience necessary for this lesson
7:30pm DJ Alan Hep2theJive Really Swingin; The Blues ~ A great
mix of Slow and Up-Town Swingin' Blues

Admission: $10

From Rte 2, East or West, take Ex 31A. That will put you on Rte
12 South. Go through three sets of lights and the Elks is on
your right (look for a white building).

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Swingin' to the Blues
